items.sentence: All the songs I sang for you today were written by me.
How can anyone sleep with all this commotion going on?
I heard that Tom and Mary will get married in October.
We\'re going to Tom\'s birthday party tomorrow, right?
If you\'d known, you would\'ve told me, wouldn\'t you?
That\'s an interesting proposal. I\'ll think about it.
Tom and I are the only ones who survived the accident.
Tom and I have known each other for about three years.
Tom and Mary are going to get married on October 20th.
Tom was walking down the street with Mary at his side.
